price: Sejak dahulu kami telah diberi ancaman dengan ini (hari kebangkitan); kami dan nenek moyang kami. Sebenarnya ini hanyalah dongeng orang-orang terdahulu."
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā hādhā naḥnu waābāunā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
